Package deusto.safebox.server.net

Class PacketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • deusto.safebox.server.net.PacketHandler
  • class PacketHandler
extends Object
    Handles the packets received by the server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      private static interface  PacketHandler.EventListener
      Marks a method as a packet listener.

      • server

      • daoManager

        private final DaoManager daoManager

      • listeners

        private final Map<Class<?>,​BiConsumer<ClientHandler,​?>> listeners
        Packet listener map. The map has a the class of the packet as a key and the listening method as a value.

        Both wildcards must be of the same type, a Packet subtype.

      • authenticatedUsers

        private final Map<ClientHandler,​UUID> authenticatedUsers
        Map containing the clients that are currently logged in.
